    mul r5.zw, r5.zzzw, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.500000, 0.500000)
    mul r3.y, r3.y, cb1[0].y

    frc r3.w, r3.w
    mad r4.w, r4.w, cb1[0].x, cb1[0].x

    mul r7.w, r7.z, cb0[5].y

    exp r7.x, -r7.x
    min r7.x, r7.x, l(1.000000)
    mad_sat r7.w, r7.z, cb0[1].x, cb0[1].y
    add r8.x, -r7.w, l(2.000000)
    mul r7.w, r7.w, r8.x
    mad r7.w, r7.w, cb0[1].z, cb0[1].w

    mad r7.x, -r7.x, r7.w, l(1.000000)
    max r7.x, r7.x, cb0[5].w

    mul r7.w, r7.w, r8.x
